As you probably know in the past AERT and DAVI have had a
Joint Radio and Recordings Committee one of the major projects
of which has been the setting up of the tape recording services
for schools.
Membership on this Committee expired: at the time'of the DAVI
Convention. The DAVI Executive Committee has voted to continue
this Committee and to request that the joint nature be continued*
Since the merger of AERT and NAEB I assume that you are the person
to whom I should write concerning this matter. If your organiza¬
tion desires to continue the co-sponsorship of this Committee we
would like for you to suggest a co-chairman from your organization
and appropriate members for the Committee. DAVI has asked Dr.
Ralph H. Hall to continue as their Chairman for this Committee.
On page six of the new Tape Recording Catalog is a list of the
previous members. I have checked the names of those in the copy
which is enclosed who were representatives of AERT. Probably
the two most active of these have been Gertrude Broderick and
Gale R. Adkins. I would suggest that the co-chairman be one of
the people who has had experience as a participant on the Committee
in the past.
I will appreciate your comments and suggestions.
Sincerely,
O'
